answers.answer: Ha ha ha. It's definitely possible to have more than one in there. I was huge w my first, I gained 57lbs., he ended up weighing 8.9. My mom and sister both had 3kids and were equally as big and gained double the weight.... But, my sister was diagnosed w gestational diabetes which can cause your baby to be huge. Jr kids were 9, 10 and 11 lbs. The last two which were the biggest were delivered exactly one month early bc they were so big.

question: I am 16w2d and I feel huge!! I had a woman at the grocery store ask if I was ready, I asked for what? She says well you're due any day now? Lol ugh!! Does anyone else have this problem? Because it ***** :P I'm hoping my doc tells me I have two in there just so I can feel a little better lol one more week and I find out what we're having!!!
title: Huge
